Package com.emse.spring.faircorp.api

Class WindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emse.spring.faircorp.api.WindowController
  • @CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/windows")
public class WindowController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for defining Window controller logics
    Author:
    Nushrat Jahan

      • findAll

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<WindowDto> findAll()
        Gets all the windows list
        Returns:
        list of windows

      • findById

        @GetMapping(path="/{window_id}")
public WindowDto findById​(@PathVariable
                          java.lang.Long window_id)
        get request for provided window id
        Parameters:
        window_id - providing window id to get information of that specific window
        Returns:
        window information which id is provided

      • findWindowsByRoomId

        @GetMapping(path="/room/{room_id}")
public java.util.List<WindowDto> findWindowsByRoomId​(@PathVariable
                                                     java.lang.Long room_id)
        Gets all the windows of specific room
        Parameters:
        room_id - provided to get all the windows that specific room contains
        Returns:
        windows of the room which room id is provided

      • switchStatus

        @PutMapping(path="/{window_id}/switch")
public WindowDto switchStatus​(@PathVariable
                              java.lang.Long window_id)
        Put request to switch window status OPEN or CLOSED
        Parameters:
        window_id - provided to switch OPEN or CLOSED the specified window
        Returns:
        new window switch status

      • create

        @PostMapping
public WindowDto create​(@RequestBody
                        WindowDto dto)
        Post request to create new window or to update window
        Parameters:
        dto - contains window name, switch status and room object
        Returns:
        new window if window id is not provided otherwise updates window with provided window id

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{window_id}")
public void delete​(@PathVariable
                   java.lang.Long window_id)
        Delete window Deletes specific window with provided window id. Window with all its content inside.
        Parameters:
        window_id - delete window by window id
